text: Sanoja is a surname which is common in Venezuela and the Dominican Republic. ==People with the name== * Chucho Sanoja (1926–1998), Venezuelan musician * Jesús Sanoja Hernández (1930–2007), Venezuelan journalist, historian, and writer * Sonia Sanoja (1932–2017), Venezuelan dancer, teacher, choreographer, and poet ==References==
title: Sanoja
